value:
Father... Mother... When all the
fighting has ended, I hope you'll
rest easy wherever you are.

My world and everyone I knew were
destroyed by the fell dragon, Grima.
I can never allow that future to be.

Making the rounds with everyone?
If you're tired, I don't mind going for
you—don't push yourself.

Can I ask a favor? I'd love you to go
shopping with me sometime—my
fashion sense is a little...absent.

I-I must apologize. I was caught up
in my training, and...I broke one of
the training dummies.

You're close friends with
$Nf, right?$k$pYou must be close, or I wouldn't
have been sent all this way to
say hello.

I will not watch another innocent
life be taken!

This strength serves more than
me alone.
I cannot settle for this!

I will use the power you've
granted me to forge a new fate.

I am Lucina of Ylisse, daughter of
Chrom. I believe that we can fight
to change our fates.$k$pI traveled back from my bleak
future to make a difference in my
father's past. Now...I am here.

This world is a truly beautiful place.
The white castle, clear blue skies...
and all the flowers, of course.$k$pThey are, all of them, irreplaceable.
We must protect this world at
all costs, $Nu.$k$pMy homeland was destroyed by war.
I can't bear to let anyone else
experience that loss.$k$p...Hm? Thank you for trying to
lift my spirits...$k$pI'm always touched by your
kindness. I hope that, whatever may
come, we'll remain side by side.
やっ！
はあっ！
うあっ！
不覚です…
I challenge my fate!
You will not stop me!
Our bonds give me strength!
I will never give up!
Not here...
Heehee
Talking with you puts me at ease. Thank you for that.
You have wonderful friends. They remind me of my own.
I must say, I admire your outfit. Is it typical where you're from?
Every day, I must fight against the despair I was born into.
If I had to choose between peace and the lives of my friends...? Hmm.
I wonder if Father is here somewhere. Perhaps training?
I swear by this sacred blade, Falchion, I will do my utmost.
OK.
Let's go.
All right.
I will honor your memory, Father.
